title: Manasa Mogali: Diamond-Adorned Gold Kadi Bangle
materials: brilliant-cut diamonds with VS clarity. Features a Hyderabadi polish for a lustrous shine.
features: This modern Kadi bangle design showcases alternating floral motifs and domed accents, each embellished with shimmering, brilliant-cut diamonds. The bangle features a secure, hidden clasp for a seamless look. The design is inspired by the 'Mogali' flower, a symbol of purity and auspiciousness.
colors: Predominantly golden yellow from the high-purity gold
complemented by the bright white sparkle of the diamonds.
occasions: and weddings. A great gift for modern women who appreciate subtle elegance with a touch of tradition.
description: This stunning bangle elegantly blends modern design with traditional Indian craftsmanship. The high-purity gold and sparkling diamonds showcase exceptional quality and create a timeless piece. The floral Mogali design adds a touch of cultural significance, symbolizing auspicious beginnings and new chapters.
